title: Ground News - 'It's uncertain which threat is most pressing – antisemitism from the left or the right'
text:
Summary by Haaretz U.S. Jews are shocked by rising antisemitism in the wake of the war in Gaza, says journalist Matthew Continetti, warning that far-right public rhetoric could influence 'terrible, awful psychopaths' like the Tree of Life synagogue shooter Share menu More
